name: zkt-sharia-circuits
description: Groth16 ZK circuits for Sharia Council review system

scripts.setup:test: snarkjs groth16 setup build/ShariaVoteAggregator.r1cs pot14_final.ptau build/sharia_0000.zkey
scripts.verify: snarkjs zkey verify build/ShariaVoteAggregator.r1cs pot14_final.ptau build/sharia_0000.zkey
scripts.prove: snarkjs groth16 fullProve input.json build/ShariaVoteAggregator_js/ShariaVoteAggregator.wasm build/sharia_0000.zkey proof.json public.json
